artist: Unknown; Publisher: New York State Department of Correctional Services et al.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription:
Note taped to front cover, black ink pen: I almost dare you to / even TRY ReAding this. By / page 3 you'll be / gagging. I keep looking For the buRning Rally / toRches and the swastikas. / I've Notated it For / you.... well. Just because. / Honestly I CAN BaRely look at it.

Other inscriptions in black ink pen, by the same hand, throughout the issue.
medium: Black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress, black ink pen, bound volume
title: Docs Today Vol. 10, no. 12
